lang.click_reset: Click the 'Reset data' button and refresh browser.
lang.close_channel_end: The gaming session was closed successfully.
lang.close_channel_start: Please wait! SPL The game session is closing!
lang.open_channel_start: Please wait. SPL Sending BETs into the game.
lang.reset_desc: All data about the current session will be deleted. Are you sure?
lang.wait_bets: Your BET will be available shortly.
lang.hint_deal: To activate 'Deal' please choose a bet
lang.hint_split: To play 'Split' wait for dealt a pair
lang.tutor_nextgame: You can start a new game. Please choose a bet
lang.tutor_closechannel: You can withdraw tokens if you want to quit the game
lang.error_bank: No money in the bank. Please contact to administrator.
lang.error_transaction: The transaction is not sent. Please contact technical support.
lang.error_balance: You do not have enough ethereum.
lang.error_balance_bet: You do not have enough BET.
lang.error_bankroller_offline: No online bankroller VALUE. Try the game with another bankroller.
lang.error_bankrollers_offline: No online bankrollers. Come back later.
lang.error_channel_not_closed: The previous time, the channel was not closed. Reset the game.
